go_data.justification: TGFbeta is implicated in the TGFbeta/SMAD signaling pathway, which is involved in the formation of juvenile polyposis, suggesting a role in cellular response to growth stimulus.
TGFbeta is part of the TGFbeta/SMAD signaling pathway, indicating involvement in signal transduction.

go_data.term: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
go_data.justification: TGFbeta is directly mentioned as part of the TGFbeta/SMAD signaling pathway.
